targets.query: SELECT mean("duration") FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success" = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT mean("allThreads") FROM "30d"."allThreads" WHERE ("testEnvironment"::tag =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest"::tag =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success" = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success" = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "label"::tag

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"

SELECT count("duration") FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "errorMessage"

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name", "errorMessage"

SELECT count("duration")  AS "OK"  FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("success" = 'true' AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "label"

SELECT count("duration")  AS "KO"  FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ( "success" = 'false' AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "label"

panels.title: Number of requests OK vs KO

targets.query: SELECT (CUMULATIVE_SUM(mean("failed"))  /  CUMULATIVE_SUM(mean("total")) ) * 100 FROM "30d"."jmeter-throughput"  WHERE ( "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter group by time(10s) fill(0)

SELECT mean("duration"), min("duration"), percentile("duration", 50), percentile("duration", 90), percentile("duration", 99), max("duration"), count("duration") FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ( "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "success" = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "label"

SELECT mean("cq_mean_response_time") FROM "30d"."jmeter-percentiles" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success" = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "label"::tag

SELECT mean("cq_max_response_time") FROM "30d"."jmeter-percentiles" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success"::tag = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "label"::tag

SELECT mean("cq_stddev_response_time") FROM "30d"."jmeter-percentiles" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success" = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "label"::tag

SELECT mean("cq_50pct_response_time") FROM "30d"."jmeter-percentiles" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success" = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "label"::tag

SELECT mean("cq_90pct_response_time") FROM "30d"."jmeter-percentiles" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success" = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "label"::tag

SELECT mean("cq_99pct_response_time") FROM "30d"."jmeter-percentiles" WHERE ( "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "success" = 'true') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

list.definition: show tag values  from requests with key="systemUnderTest"
list.name: system_under_test
list.query: show tag values  from requests with key="systemUnderTest"

list.definition: show tag values from requests with key="testEnvironment" where "systemUnderTest" =~ /$system_under_test/
list.name: test_environment
list.query: show tag values from requests with key="testEnvironment" where "systemUnderTest" =~ /$system_under_test/
